title: Piscataway Park: Park Home
body: A place of great natural beauty...  Piscataway Park is home to bald eagles, beavers, deer, foxes, ospreys, and many other species. To complement the surroundings, the park has, in addition to a public fishing pier and two boardwalks over fresh water tidal wetlands, a variety of nature trails, meadows, and woodland areas. The Park is also home to National Colonial Farm.              National Colonial Farm   A historic farm museum that demonstrates 18th century agriculture and a certified organic farm used for demonstration and education.
